quest.name: Buzzing at Church
journal: Esmour needs an exterminator at the Church of Saint Adama Landama.
Corpses have drawn blowfly swarms to the vicinity of the church. Slay five of the swarms to keep them in check.
You have slain five blowfly swarms. Report back to Esmour at the church.
Esmour thanks you for having ensured the safety and well-being of the mourners who visit the church.

dialogue.name: ESMOUR
dialogue.text: You have troubled yourself to come all this way. I wonder if I might not trouble you a bit further.

dialogue.name: ESMOUR
dialogue.text: As you well know, we keep a lichyard here. The scent of death's decay draws blowfly swarms, which are as unclean as they are unwelcome.

dialogue.name: ESMOUR
dialogue.text: Slay five of these pestilent swarms, and the church will be in your debt.

dialogue.name: ESMOUR
dialogue.text: Thank you, friend. If the swarms were to spread their pestilence at the church unchecked, before long we would need to mourn the mourning.

dialogue.name: ESMOUR
dialogue.text: For the time being, at least, the grieving can pray in peace for their dead to cross over safely. Thal bless you.
